name: Elementouria
description:
Elementouria is a two-dimensional role-playing game currently in development by Frank J. Hunter and Michael A. Carrion.

Features:

  • Walking, talking, pausing, & menu-ing!
  • Fighting fearful, ferocious fungi!
  • A village- with villagers!
  • Fleeing and dying!
  • And so much more!

As Elementouria is in development at the moment, there are some features we would like to develop in the future, including:

  • Better combat system and menus
  • Options to use skills and spells
  • Graphics that will display during dialogue
  • Better sprites and music
  • Better audio and visual effects
  • More enemy variety

Both keyboard and game controller controls are supported

Controls:
